snippet.title: Schachkampf - Fantasy Chess Trailer 2
snippet.description:
Play the game:
https://www.schachkampf.com

This is the improved trailer for my chess game Schachkampf.
It's mainly about solving chess puzzles, but with the option of having normal skirmish matches and matches with different starting positions.
It's obviously highly inspired by battlechess. But why not give something you like a new touch?
I used stockfish AI, so no matter how good you are you'll find a configuration to have the fitting opponent.

If you want to get in contact with me:
Discord: https://discord.gg/QHXBP5TPb8
if you want to follow me on social media:
www.keyboardkrieger.de

#unity2d #unity​ #gamedev​ #indiegame​ #gamedevelopment #madewithunity​ #indiedev​ #chess #chessgame #pixelart #retro
